name: Mutation (Noxids)
description:
Mutation is an action side scroller in which you take on the role of a mutant fighting to escape from the laboratory who made him. Use a series of randomised abilities to slash, blast and fight your way to the exit. It was created during the Game Makers Toolkit Game Jam 2020.

WASD to move
Spacebar to Jump
Hold S and press the Spacebar for high jump
Left click to use available ability

Music by &seb and Daniel Walsh
Sound Design by Daniel Walsh
Pixel Art by Rix and Eduardo Sousa (megaoy)
Programming by Jack Dixon
